## AutoUpdatingLoader class

Loads an embedded policy decision point bundle from a given URL, and polls for updates.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class AutoUpdatingLoader extends Loader 
```
**Extends:** [Loader](./embedded.loader.md)

</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>

[activate()](./embedded.autoupdatingloader.activate.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Promote the [pending](./embedded.autoupdatingloader.pending.md) embedded policy decision point bundle (if any) to active, so that it is used to evaluate policy decisions.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[stop()](./embedded.autoupdatingloader.stop.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Stops polling for new embedded policy decision point bundles, and aborts any in-flight updates.


</td></tr>
